arStrings.szText: The Scales of History
Mordarin requires aid uncovering the ancient secrets of the mage clans.
Mordarin, the traveling sorcerer, has asked for my help. He needs a Weak Elixir of Shadow Resistance to protect him on an important research mission.
Give Mordarin a Elixir of Shadow Resistance
Mordarin has asked for my help in uncovering the relationship between the mage clans and the armored nangari that make Nahantu their home. I should meet him outside Kurast.
Meet Mordarin near the southeast Kurast gate
Mordarin has asked for my help searching the nearby ruins for anything of interest relating to the mage clans and the nangari.
Travel to the ruins with Mordarin
Mordarin has asked for my help searching the nearby ruins for anything of interest relating to the mage clans and the nangari.
Search the ruins for evidence
Search the ruins for evidence
Mordarin has asked for my help searching the nearby ruins for anything of interest relating to the mage clans and the nangari.
Bring Mordarin the scroll
A scrap of ancient parchment has confirmed Mordarin's suspicions that the mage clans used these nangari for war. He has asked me to collect their hearts, eyes, and armor scraps to learn more.
Collect {ITEM:QST_Naha_ScalesOfHistory_Eye}: {DONE_OVER_NEEDED}
Collect {ITEM:QST_Naha_ScalesOfHistory_Heart}: {DONE_OVER_NEEDED}
Collect {ITEM:QST_Naha_ScalesOfHistory_Armor}: {DONE_OVER_NEEDED}
Mordarin has asked me to collect nangari hearts, eyes, and armor scraps to know more about the magic that suffused them.
Bring the items to Mordarin
Mordarin wants me to meet him in a nearby clearing. He seems to have something on his mind regarding the nangari. I should meet him there.
Enter the Mage Clan Ruins
Mordarin attempted to remove the ancient enchantments on the nangari but failed. We survived and abandoned further attempts, but I should speak with him to make sure he is all right.
Speak with Mordarin outside
